name: Kutukan Bagi Polisi #Temannya Pakde
description:
Figure in comic "Kutukan Bagi Polisi"

"Kutukan bagi polisi" comic is a protest from the comic artist. The story was inspired by personal experience as a student.
At that time the traffic to campus was often documents vehicle checked. People used to call it "cegatan".  Cegatan is a very annoying thing. This sparked a lot of bad gossip from the public about the traffic police.
So many people don't like it, there is a curse for "naughty" cops.


Iwank, or Erwan Hersisusanto, is a comic artist. He has been actively making comics since 2000 under the YELLOWTEETHCOMIC label. 
The comics story comes from dayli life and personal experience. Slank language and comic figur is a Yellowteeth characteristic. There so many comics have been made and distributed individually in photocopy, except for the "Kornchonk Chaos Comic" which has been published by a major publisher.
